name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Expert Full-Stack Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions. Proficient in **TypeScript**, **Vue**, **React**, **Node.js**, and adept at NoSQL databases including **Firestore**, **MongoDB**, and **DynamoDB**. Well-versed in developing and deploying **Serverless Architecture** applications, enhancing user experiences through **IDE Plugins** and testing frameworks such as **Playwright**. Demonstrated leadership and effective communication in guiding teams towards project success while ensuring adherence to best practices in full-stack development. Experienced in modern technologies including **Python**, **Flutter**, and an extensive tech stack featuring **React**, **Next.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Expertise in building and deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, along with a solid foundation in microservices architecture, CI/CD automation, and compliance standards such as HIPAA. Passionate about crafting intelligent, maintainable systems that have a meaningful real-world impact.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Demonstrated expertise in **Full-stack Development** by designing and implementing scalable solutions utilizing **TypeScript**, **React** (17–18), **Node.js**, and **Vue 3** for high-demand applications in healthcare and finance.
•	Leveraged **NoSQL** databases like **MongoDB** to optimize data storage and querying for large-scale applications, ensuring efficient data handling and retrieval.
•	Orchestrated the transition of traditional applications into **Serverless Architecture** using **AWS Lambda** and **Azure Functions**, achieving a 99.9% uptime and enhancing system resilience.
•	Integrated advanced capabilities in hybrid cloud environments by deploying models and services on **Firebase** and **DynamoDB**, streamlining cross-platform functionalities.
•	Fostered collaboration and effective communication with cross-functional teams to lead projects, ensuring alignment with best practices and business objectives.
•	Pioneered innovative solutions for hybrid cloud applications, employing modern frameworks and tools to boost development efficiency and performance.
•	Implemented comprehensive IDE Plugins and automated testing protocols with **Playwright** and **Jest** to ensure high code quality and minimize bugs in production.
•	Delivered robust mobile applications with a focus on user experience across platforms by integrating frameworks like **Flutter** and **React Native**.
•	Applied leadership skills to guide development teams in adopting **DevOps** methodologies, enhancing build and deployment cycles through tools like **GitHub Actions**.
•	Conceived and executed initiatives for continuous integration and delivery to maintain high standards of operational efficiency and project delivery timelines, achieving a 30% reduction in deployment times.

Demonstrated leadership in **Full-stack Development** for financial platforms, driving modernization through a microservices architecture with **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), resulting in a **30%** increase in scalability and maintainability for high-volume transactions.
Developed responsive, user-centric front-end applications utilizing **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, implementing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to enhance user experience for financial dashboards and admin portals, significantly improving user satisfaction metrics by **25%**.
Crafted real-time transaction monitoring dashboards employing **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling operational teams to effectively track financial activities and detect anomalies, leading to a **40%** reduction in response times for alerts.
Integrated **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to design a robust, event-driven architecture, facilitating asynchronous communication and real-time event processing for transactions, alerts, and compliance workflows, enhancing system responsiveness by **50%**.
Developed and orchestrated ETL pipelines with **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, facilitating both batch and real-time ingestion of financial data from internal and external sources, improving data processing efficiency by **60%**.
Implemented AI/ML-powered fraud detection systems utilizing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, analyzing transaction patterns and user behavior to proactively flag suspicious activities and decreasing fraud incidents by **35%**.
Created ML pipelines for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, seamlessly integrating model inference into backend services to support real-time decision-making, contributing significantly to operational efficiency.

• Demonstrated expertise in **Full-stack Development** by designing and optimizing backend services for a global e-commerce platform leveraging **Python** (**FastAPI, Django**) and **Node.js** (**NestJS, Express**), ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across 3 key modules: checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
• Engineered dynamic, real-time features utilizing **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, facilitating responsive order updates and enhancing customer support capabilities.
• Developed high-performing frontend applications using **React** (**18**), **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, combined with **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS**, to deliver fast, responsive user experiences on both web and mobile platforms.
• Leveraged diverse databases including **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra** for distributed data storage solutions, ensuring rapid and fault-tolerant data access for high-traffic e-commerce workflows, achieving an up to **40%** reduction in access times through effective caching strategies.
• Integrated AI/ML-driven recommendation systems using **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to enhance user engagement by personalizing product listings and optimizing search relevance, boosting conversion rates by **15%** based on real-time behavioral data.
• Implemented **Redis** caching strategies for product metadata, shopping cart sessions, and search queries, resulting in a **25%** improvement in application responsiveness and reduced database read pressure.
• Managed feature flags and blue-green deployment strategies using **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes** namespaces, allowing for controlled rollouts and A/B testing to minimize disruption during major platform updates.
• Created SEO-friendly, mobile-optimized e-commerce user interfaces using **Next.js**, **Vue 3 + Nuxt**, and **HTML5/CSS3**, focusing on compliance with accessibility standards (WCAG **2.1**).
• Developed secure payment processing workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring compliance with **PCI** standards through tokenized transactions.
• Enforced role-based access control (RBAC) and implemented **OAuth 2.0** strategies for secure customer and admin interactions, ensuring adherence to **GDPR** guidelines for user data protection.
